pluginstrument.author: Rob Verdon
pluginstrument.description:
Cessna Citation CJ4 FMS-3200 FMC-CDU Overlay Rob Verdon Rob.Verdon@gmail.com 2-26-2021 *Must have mobiflight-event-module in community folder See this forum for info: https://forums.flightsimulator.com/t/full-g1000-control-now-with-mobiflight/348509
The scren must be "popped" out of the game using the right ALT key and clicking on the screen. The screen size must be streched behind the overlay.
Note: SP, BRT and DIM not working.
